front.title: Basic Support for IPv6 over IEEE Std 802.11 Networks Operating Outside the Context of a Basic Service Set

abstract.t: This document provides methods and settings, for using IPv6 to communicate among nodes within range of one another over a single IEEE 802.11-OCB link. Support for these methods and settings require minimal changes to existing stacks. This document also describes limitations associated with using these methods. Optimizations and usage of IPv6 over more complex scenarios is not covered in this specification and is subject of future work.
